thread.title: Tom Brady responded to a meme about his Super Bowl sideline thoughts
thread.title_full: Tom Brady responded to a meme about his Super Bowl sideline thoughts

title: Tom Brady responded to a meme about his Super Bowl sideline thoughts
text:
Tom Brady is a five-time Super Bowl champion, an Under Armour sleepwear spokesman , and… an Instagram comedian?
From Lady Gaga’s action-packed halftime routine to Julio Jones’ Michael Jackson-esque catch , Super Bowl 51 produced quite a few viral memes. One in particular, which circulated throughout social media on Sunday, was a photo of Brady with his head down on the bench, apparently reflecting on the team’s less-than-stellar first half performance and praying for a miracle.
His prayer seemed to work– the Pats came back from a 25-point deficit to secure a 34-28 victory in overtime. Fans wondered what exactly Brady said to curry favor with a higher power.
4real. Tom call me.
A photo posted by Elliot Tebele (@fuckjerry) on Feb 6, 2017 at 4:38pm PST
“I need to know what prayer Brady said so I can use it later in life,” the meme said.
The meme asked, and Brady himself answered–in the form of an Instagram comment.
The man does it all! @tombrady #GOAT
A photo posted by Elliot Tebele (@fuckjerry) on Feb 6, 2017 at 7:07pm PST
“Hey, so remember that whole David Tyree thing from a few years ago,” Brady replied on Elliot Tebele (@fuckjerry)’s Instagram post.
Ask and ye shall receive, Patriots fans.
